author: bridge-bot
content: <draganrakita> Should repricing be focused on EOF opcodes as reprice will not break contracts?

author: bridge-bot
content: <shemnon> I think that would be a large burden to existing implementations.  While I like the idea of ossifying legacy, when it comes to shared environment issues like the gas schedule I think we should keep them in sync.

author: bridge-bot
content: <draganrakita> Would focus only on opcodes that EOF supports and to make things easier change overlapping opcodes in legacy

author: bridge-bot
content: <shemnon> It may, but I don't think we should take special effort to exclude opcodes.
